page.title: 08THE AUXILIARY COASTGUARD
page.content: MR CLIFFORD STURMEY is the second in command of the{Lulworth Auxiliary {Coastguard.}He has been a coastguard for over 22 years and has a Long Service Medal. He patrols the cliffs,scanning the sea and beaches with binoculars,for people in distress.He has rescued lots of people from the cliffs and he has also rescued several dogs, sheep and 2 cows! He has to train 6 times a year, to make sure that he knows how to rescue people correctly. The three Lulworth Coastguards are on duty every week end.The Coastguards at Weymouth and Swanage are on duty every day.
